On Tuesday, 17 senators led by Barack Obama Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y., wrote to Secretary of State Hillary Clinton urging the administration to veto the move and make it clear to the Palestinian Authority that it needs to sit down in direct talks with Israel, rather than pursue unhelpful resolutions at the United Nations.
